name: TeamCS Walkey Doggy
description:
Welcome to Walkey Doggy! In this game, you will have to walk your cute little pet Cheesecake. Be careful! You do not want it to bother other pedestrians and mostly you do not want it to approach the trash cans on the street! Make sure to react fast!

(Please run in full screen)

------------------------------------------------------TeamCS---------------------------------------------------

Due to the inevitable translation error from Unity C# to WebGL, there might be some unexpected bugs in the gameplay.  Therefore, we also have a downloadable version of our game in the link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CPkLHSO2d4EXSw6LxWj-1rMdDSWBFgeC/view?usp=shari...

（Windows 10 only) 

Thank you for your understanding！

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DESIGN OBJECTIVE

Walkey Doggy is a game created by Carleton University’s students for IMD2006 (Introduction to Computer Games) Our objectives are:

  • Provide a relax/calm effect
  • Create a responsible feel
  • Use the keyboard to control the player and the dog

ATTRIBUTIONS

  • Dog Asset: By dorate on Sketchfab: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cheesecake-78b778797edd4e48ab733a15d38aa205
  • Environment Asset: By 255 pixel studios on Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/city-package-107224
  • Character Asset: By Adobe Mixamo 
  • Menu Assets: Created with Procreate by Xinyue Lu
  • Music: "Royalty Free Music from Bensound"
